title: Design and Operation of an Elementary Language Education System Using Mobile Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and language education experience
context.additional_context: Training program for pre-service and in-service teachers to acquire language teaching methods using a mobile-based blended learning system.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three design principles for language education content utilizing mobile learning environments.
One can design and operate microlearning modules using video/text/audio materials on 3G-based mobile devices
One can develop lesson plans utilizing discussion and quiz features to promote learner interaction in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
